name: MovieAntakshari-MultiplayerGameofMovieNames
0:
”Alexa open Movie Antakshari”
”Alexa start Movie Antakshari”
”Alexa play Movie Antakshari”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie antakshari
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Are you ready to challenge with your movie names knowledge? Then let's play "Movie Antakshari" game, Game of movie names. [Antakshari = Antya + Akshar means 'the game of the ending letter'] 

In this game alexa will be your game host. You will be playing with another player (players from another country/region/city) who will beat you with a movie name (Movie names can be of any language movies) You have to tell another movie name with ending letter of the movie name he just told you. 

eg: Player 1 says "Avatar" then you should say movie name with it's ending letter "r" that is "rambo" then Player 1 will tell you a movie with starting letter "o" and continues the game till you or Player 1 Wins the game.

Sample Game play:

Freddy: play movie antakshari
Alexa: Welcome to Movie Antakshari, game of Movie names.
Alexa: Let's begin. Your game opponent name is "George". Please add your playername by saying like, "my playername is alexa". What is your player Name?
User: my player name is freddy
George: Hi Freddy, I'm starting with "Avatar". Now, Tell me a movie name with it's ending letter "R"?
Freddy: Rambo
Alexa: well done, "Rambo" with ending letter "O"". 
George: hmmm, I would say "Oblivion", the ending letter "N"?
...............
.......
... Continues until Freddy vs George wins the game!

Movie Antakshari is a Multiplayer game, meaning you're giving alexa with movie names to challenge other players who are playing the game. You and other players challenge each other by giving out new movie names to alexa. Check the game regularly for new movie updates and difficulty levels. 

If you like this game, please give your valuable reviews and ratings!

Suggestions and feedback appreciated. If you are facing any issues send me a mail to fix it.
Contact me - jacksonlives@gmail.com
